Links

Below is a collection of helpful links for students.

  • I built this site using Jekyll.
  • I use KaTeX to render mathematics on my pages, but not all of the functionally of MathJax has been implemented. You too can enable this blazing fast rendering engine on your pages by following this post.
  • Mathematics Stack Exchange
  • Purdue Geometry Seminar
  • Geometric Group Theory
  • For graduate students interested in topology, join the topology students mailing list.
